website_summaries.verdict: Adjustable chest plate helps ensure a proper fit. Well made product that will last a long time.
pros: Soft neoprene inner lining for comfort
Customers report a good fit for smaller dogs
cons: Customers report having some problems setting up the vest because of a lack of written instructions

customer_reviews.title: Proud To Serve
customer_reviews.text: The difference this comfortable for the service dog vest/harness makes is many more times its meager cost. Our dog Boogie's girth is 26" and the fit is perfect and doesn't shift or rub his coat. He always hated a collar but tolerates this ensemble wonderfully. Maybe he recognizes that he is dressed up in a snazzy uniform or that he gets more attention and respect. No matter, he enjoys it being put on every morning and sometimes resists it being removed at night.
customer_reviews.author: Kel Ford

customer_reviews.title: Attention:"Service Dog", on the J.O.B.!
customer_reviews.text: Well,the first time I encountered this "Service Dog" thing was in a grocery store. So being a bit curious I asked not only the store manager but the dog's owner. And come to find out its a Federal law,that you can not deny a Master and his or her dog entry in to almost any business! So now days, when a person can expect most anything, it's good to have your best friend with you at all times!
customer_reviews.author: HikerMiker

customer_reviews.title: Bright and well marked. Easy to see and read...which, after all, is the point.
customer_reviews.text: This harness seems to be well made. I agree with other reviewers that the big buckle right behind the leg looks a little painful, but I left the breaststrap a little loose to give the leg a bit more room to move and my Beagle seems fine with it. I like that it appears professional and solves problems before they start. I carry a few of the cards with me just in case, but haven't needed them yet. I am really thankful to have this harness as it allows me to take my service dog into areas I would probably not be able to without it.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: Well made, looks great, fits well.
customer_reviews.text: This fits well and after you get it adjusted, it doesn't roll at all. Ginnie is not aware there is anything on her back at all. She is a 35 pound border collie mix. Her girth is 15". We got a medium. It looks very official and will be great for the airport and plane trip coming up soon. Also got the traffic leash to aid in keeping her close during the trip and purchased a 6 ft leash for potty breaks.
customer_reviews.author: BeBee

customer_reviews.title: This is a very fine piece of dog-wear
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fine piece of dog-wear. It is sturdy and well made, and in other reviews I read other people say that these vests are sized on the small-side, but that was not my experience; I found that the vest fit our dog perfectly and was true to its stated measurements. The dog LOVES IT! He usually does not like "clothes" but this vest seems to be the exception---"time to take off the vest" is not nearly as fun or exciting to his as "time to put on the vest" is. Thank you Bark-Outfitters!
customer_reviews.author: icanhaschickensandwich

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: So I love the best. It's very sturdy and well made! The handle is great feature I use all the time and the velcro & saddlebag loops are great. I knocked it down a star because the service dog labels are only reflective stickers and they have peeled off in bits.
customer_reviews.author: Djacktrade

customer_reviews.title: Nice Harness
customer_reviews.text: I really like the harness and it seems to be comfortable on Lady. The directions could be a little more easier to understand.If this had been my 1st time I would have sent it back!My main problem is that the white lettering of the service dog sticker has rubbed off!! Do I order more since they're velcoed on or what?
customer_reviews.author: Mary McCarley

customer_reviews.title: sizing
customer_reviews.text: Excellent harness. I agree with others, however. Do your measurements and then order next size larger. I did, and it fits perfect. Mary in Iowa
customer_reviews.author: MM

customer_reviews.title: High quality, seems comfy for my dog.
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality and sturdy vest. Looks very professional on my dog. Patches are high quality as well. Color is as pictured (I bought the blue), and the sizing was perfect. The interior padding seems soft and cushy, and my dog seemed comfortable wearing this harness.
customer_reviews.author: Laura A.

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my registered service dog. Very disappointed, it started to rip and fell apart in 1 months time.
customer_reviews.author: Kat T

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic fit. The only issue was that instructions didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic fit. The only issue was that instructions didn't come with it so that it could be assembled correctly. Easily corrected with an email to the company. Definitely recommended to all who have a service animal.
customer_reviews.author: John Litschauer

customer_reviews.title: Great, Love Them
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful The vest fits my dog really well, and comfortable. The color is great it catches people's eye and they know that his a service dog. It looks very clean and professional. Very easy to take on and off. It's everything I wanted, I couldn't ask for. Thank you for providing such a get vest and fast service.
customer_reviews.author: Vera

customer_reviews.title: AGAIN, ANOTHER DISIREABLE OPTION WOULD BE A ROTATEING CLASP ...
customer_reviews.text: AGAIN, ANOTHER DISIREABLE OPTION WOULD BE A ROTATEING CLASP... 'SO THE ANIMAL DOSE NOT GET CAUGHT UP ALL THE TIME (TWISTED UP)...
customer_reviews.author: Terry L. Fotia

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and easy to use. Tucker likes it and that maters a lot to me. Tucker is a Blue Heeler and my service dog, trained to help with PTSD and helping get along with one leg. Great idem.
customer_reviews.author: KIP ALLEN

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Not really a good quality a couple times of your dog laying down rubs the letters off the patches they give you the bottom strap broke within the first few days
customer_reviews.author: D. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Service Dog vest is sturdy,
customer_reviews.text: The vest is very sturdy and should be serviceable and last a long time. It was a quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Donna L Whittaker

customer_reviews.title: I is a perfect fit. My Pupson seems to feel comfortable wearing ...
customer_reviews.text: I is a perfect fit. My Pupson seems to feel comfortable wearing it! the quality is top notch. Thanks for the quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Campagna

customer_reviews.title: Medium or LG?  Not sure?  GET LARGE.
customer_reviews.text: My dog is right between large size and medium, but still within the advertised medium-range. Since the Large was $12 more, I opted for the medium. ' The medium was uncomfortably snug around my female British Labrador's ribs. It also chafed and rubbed away the hair in her armpits. ' The quality was otherwise satisfactory but not by much. If anyone is wondering which size to get their medium/large dog, play it safe and get the large. Or keep shopping for an alternative seller with better prices or invest the $ in better quality. That's my 2¢
customer_reviews.author: SamiSue

customer_reviews.title: This is a great package deal
customer_reviews.text: This is a great package deal. I want nothing for the best for my beautiful rescued service Dog. The vest itself is of durable quality. I love that it also has the reflective features. And came with 50 ADA cards.
customer_reviews.author: P. G.

customer_reviews.title: Wish this vest did not have a handle on it
customer_reviews.text: Back would be a great place for don't touch don't talk patch. Side pockets would be nice but the structure is fantastic. Don't get rid of that!
customer_reviews.author: L. Cline

customer_reviews.title: Ready to roll!
customer_reviews.text: The service dog vest is perfect. It is well made. Fitting it to our dog was a breeze. We are looking forward to many years of use. Contact from the seller has been great! This company values customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Vanetta Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Poor fit description
customer_reviews.text: The ad needs a picture of where to measure your dog! Doesn't fit.
customer_reviews.author: Soft Knocks

customer_reviews.title: ... on high end of size small--the medium fits him perfect. This item is very well made and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I always read the comments on Amazon before purchasing so I ordered a size up--my dog measured 21" so it was on high end of size small--the medium fits him perfect. This item is very well made and the cards will be very useful. Highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good vest, order size up if on the cusp
customer_reviews.text: I would give this 5 stars if the sizing was perfect (order the next size if you're within 2" of the larger size) and if my dog wasn't able to slip out of it backwards, which is fairly easy for her to do. Other than that, it's sturdy and will last as long as it fits my dog.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Reliable, comfortable and well made
customer_reviews.text: This vest is excellently made and very comfortable for my pup. barkOutfitters as a seller was extremely responsive when I had and issue and overall I am pleased with both my purchase and my experience with the seller. Definitely recommend this vest and company.
customer_reviews.author: Lissira

customer_reviews.title: Well made vest.
customer_reviews.text: The vest is very comfortable to my service dog. I like how it does not cover Maggie's back. It is easy to get it off and on again. I am very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: RR Man

customer_reviews.title: The vest fits my dog wonderfully. I only wish there were more colour choices
customer_reviews.text: Service was accurate and very timely. The vest fits my dog wonderfully. I only wish there were more colour choices!
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J. Seddon

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: extremely well made and easy to put on. I did buy the wrong size though, it fits him, but the medium (size 28 ) Is just too snug for him. I did measure his chest which was 28", but it's still a bit too tight.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry  Grad

customer_reviews.title: High-quality product!
customer_reviews.text: I don't have anything to compare to, but this is sturdy, high quality, and true to its description. I ordered the wrong size at first, returned it (THANK YOU, AMAZON, for your amazing return policies!), bought the right size, got it in 1 day, and love it. The company sends instructions for sizing it, too. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Danna Van Noy

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: The harness is good quality but it does not have a center vertical chest strap as the picture clearly shows. The reason I chose this harness was for the center chest strap.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Norm Lanier, the owner of barkoutfitters: This vest is very well made perfect fit/stylish to The only thing is that I can tell someone returned it there's small teeth marks around the buckle part. and they didn't include the service dog paper, that is shown.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Awesome and fits perfectly. It is adjustable.. I would recommend to anyone who has a service dog.
customer_reviews.author: Pam

customer_reviews.title: This is the one!!
customer_reviews.text: Great product and communications was very good. Made a small change as it was not exactly fitting so order some more strapping and all it good, thanks for a premium product!
customer_reviews.author: Randall W. Cribbs

customer_reviews.title: looks great..
customer_reviews.text: Works greal ..... looks great ..... glad i chose this one
customer_reviews.author: Lee Gaines

customer_reviews.title: Sizes run on the small size/inaccurate, I had to ...
customer_reviews.text: Sizes run on the small size/inaccurate, I had to return for another size. My dog is 25 inches, purchased the vest claiming to be 22-28, with the strap all the way extended it was entirely to tight of my dog. Be cautious when purchasing from this vendor!
customer_reviews.author: thomas molino

customer_reviews.title: Tough
customer_reviews.text: I wish it were a little larger length wise, but overall this is a nice vest. Don't buy for a German Shepherd though.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Best Service Dog Vest Yet
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product and service from the company. The only issue is the "Service Dog" tags lettering disintegrates.
customer_reviews.author: C. I. Goodheim

customer_reviews.title: Good investment
customer_reviews.text: Vest fits great. Patches though are another story after a few hours it stopped saying service dog and now says service doc
customer_reviews.author: Joshua E. Nash

customer_reviews.title: Good for medical service dog
customer_reviews.text: A must have. No instructions but easy to figure out and box store friendly.
customer_reviews.author: ashley

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfect, nice reflective material, I would buy again !!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely, and doesn't twist to the side like the basic harnesses do. My Aussie wears this one proudly.
customer_reviews.author: DR

customer_reviews.title: Works really well and my dog can't wait to get ...
customer_reviews.text: Works really well and my dog can't wait to get it on. He knows he's going to work. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Wanda Porter

customer_reviews.title: The best is really nice tho
customer_reviews.text: Package came with missing service dog patches. I’ve called twice and they don’t return calls. The best is really nice tho. I’m happy with the product just wish they returned calls within 24/hrs like they say they would.
customer_reviews.author: johnny byrns

customer_reviews.title: Suit Up Pup!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves his service best and so do I. When it's time to "suit up" he knows he's working and wears his vest proudly. I purchased the size based on the measurements given and it fits him perfectly, no rubbing or chaffing. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Stone

customer_reviews.title: Well made products and fits well on my service dog ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made products and fits well on my service dog. My only con is that I wish the front connecting strap was easier to get one and off my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Jacque Acosta

customer_reviews.title: Well made harness
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality although I ordered the wrong size. My little Pitbull will need a large. No problem returning and reordering. I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Scuber410

customer_reviews.title: Very Professional!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fit, and maintain control. Very high quality, and fits my 60lb Pit/Dal Mix well!
customer_reviews.author: SuprDave62

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to fit. Great quality and super service and followup.
customer_reviews.author: Golf fan Di

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good well made product, great for rope work with our young GSP hunting dogs in training
customer_reviews.author: dennie h.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great! Very well made Really happy with this vest ...
customer_reviews.text: Fits great! Very well made Really happy with this vest Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: a chestplate
customer_reviews.text: The harness itself fits flawlessly and high quality I do believe I was shipped the wrong chest plate it is way to long for the harness it bunches up and I loved this harness because it had the front and back protection
customer_reviews.author: jacob sacks

customer_reviews.title: Top of the line great quality
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust, clean and stylish, great product that also comes with 50 cards concerning service dog laws and your rights.
customer_reviews.author: Chrystie

customer_reviews.title: Best vest on amazon
customer_reviews.text: Best vest on amazon! My dog and I are very happy with the look and the feel. Great quality!
customer_reviews.author: David S.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great fit. Flexible adjustment. MEDIUM fit my 24 pound shepherd mix perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Mathew Astrom

customer_reviews.title: family and dog happy with vest harness
customer_reviews.text: my disabled wife was able to put it together very quickly. easy to place on dog. we got it the first time, no problems. very good fit.
customer_reviews.author: David Alexander

customer_reviews.title: poor design and followed their measurements and strap brook on ...
customer_reviews.text: poor design and followed their measurements and strap brook on day one threw it in garbage...bought another for $28 and its way better then the $50 they charged me for this piece of garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Eric N.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest. My 14 week old German Shepherd plays better with it on than other vests.
customer_reviews.author: harry g.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The vest is very well made and looks great on our dog.
customer_reviews.author: Christina R Short

customer_reviews.title: They are a good training harnes but that's it
customer_reviews.text: They run alittle small so I'd get the next size up if it's anywhere close and it's not as big as I would like it to be down the back just something to keep in mind when buying them
customer_reviews.author: David Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great vest but too
customer_reviews.text: if you're dog is AT ALL close to the end of the girth measurement go with the next size up. Great vest but too small
customer_reviews.author: Peyton Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. I have ordered these in three different sizes. Nice job.
customer_reviews.author: William T Urbanski

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice sturdy product with easy to follow proper fitting instructions online!
customer_reviews.author: sharon camp

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Thanks
customer_reviews.text: Well made and durable material! Fits perfectly on my dog. Great product. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: No instructions were included with this product and the service dog tags are pealing off already.
customer_reviews.author: Greenhouse Inc.  Scott Green

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We love the vest! It is so much easier to go places now! Thank you so much!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca Pittman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Service Dogs
customer_reviews.text: Fits perfectly. Arrived on time. Wish I had ordered more service dog strips.
customer_reviews.author: JessicaJo

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Loved this vest! It works perfect for my 20 pound dog!
customer_reviews.author: Charles Etta Mynhier

customer_reviews.title: Was a perfect fit to size and very well made and durable
customer_reviews.text: Was a perfect fit to size and very well made and durable! As he grows I will definitely be ordering from them again!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: The vest is exactly as advertised. It is well made and the instructions are very clear on how to fit the vest to the dog. The ADA cards are a nice addition.
customer_reviews.author: Quilted Robin

customer_reviews.title: needs  instructions on how to put it on
customer_reviews.text: i love it took me a bit to figure out how to put it on but i got it but it fits great
customer_reviews.author: Acacia

customer_reviews.title: Service dog vest.
customer_reviews.text: Vest turned out better than expected. Great quality and we'll made. Very fast shipping. Lexi sure looks good wearing it.
customer_reviews.author: James L. Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great material and allows for a custom fit for our dog. Thanks!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality at a great price, fast shipping. Would buy from again.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality product! Excellent customer service. The vest was just as described.

customer_reviews.title: ... is a 60lb pit bull and it for him perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is a 60lb pit bull and it for him perfect!

customer_reviews.title: My boxer is very comfortable with the product
customer_reviews.text: Prompt service. Vest is everything it. Said it would be. My boxer is very comfortable with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Doris M.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: BE SURE TO ORDER A SIZE UP BUT THE VEST AND QUALITY OF THE VEST ARE GREAT
customer_reviews.author: john fisher

customer_reviews.title: This arnes has nothing to have with the quality you ...
customer_reviews.text: This arnes has nothing to have with the quality you used to have when I bought your arnes 8 months ago. This one you are selling is nothing, compare to that one you used to sell. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Brigitte Manchon

customer_reviews.title: Dog vest
customer_reviews.text: The vest is a perfect fit! nice and sturdy well made and quick delivery
customer_reviews.author: rachel clark

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vest.
customer_reviews.text: Great vest. Fits perfectly ( I did NOT measure my dog because I'm lazy and hoped for the best ) and isn't awkward for my dog to wear. Also comes with little "business" cards with service dog information.
customer_reviews.author: Molly

customer_reviews.title: Excellent service and product
customer_reviews.text: great instructions, easy to put together and a good fit. Thanks you
customer_reviews.author: Rochelle Buffenstein

customer_reviews.title: Vest
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with the service dog vest the fit was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Ellene

customer_reviews.title: Not on my dog!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't fit & fit and finish sub-par, stitching isn't very well done. Returning! Purchase the Dogline Alpha you'll be happier.
customer_reviews.author: Gary Gay

customer_reviews.title: Service Vest
customer_reviews.text: The service vest fits my service dog really good, just wish it was a little wider to where I could out her other patches on it like here service register service patch and her dont not pet patches, but other then that she enjoys it and it fits her better then her first one
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer
